section.title: TearMenuOff
section.para: When assigned to a menu item, it inserts a tear off bar into the menu (a horizontal broken line). Activating that item tears off the menu. If the menu item has a label, it is shown instead of the broken line. If used outside menus, this command does nothing. Examples:
section.programlisting:
WindowMenu + I "" TearMenuOff
RootMenu + I "click here to tear me off" TearMenuOff
